lead_paragraph: An associate of a Philadelphia woman charged in a plot to join the Islamic State militant group pledged to avenge her arrest, a federal prosecutor said.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Terror Suspect Held After Threats Cited
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Terror Suspect Held After Threats Cited
